Finesse¶

Argon Solver¶

This module contains a few different MultiNest calibration solvers for the Th lamp with the 488 nm central wavelength 1 nm fwhm filter.

fabry.finesse.argon_solver.mu¶

Tuple with the relative masses for Th and Ar

fabry.finesse.argon_solver.w0¶

Tuple with Th I and Ar II wavelengths used for calibration

fabry.finesse.argon_solver.solver(output_folder, prior_filename, data_filename, Lpost, dpost, resume=True, test_plot=False)¶

MultiNest solver for point spread function calibration with the Argon filter

Parameters:
  • output_folder (str) – path to folder containing input and output files for finesse solver
  • prior_filename (str) – path to file for the MultiNest prior (json format)
  • data_filename (str) – path to file for the input data
  • Lpost (np.ndarray) – array of equally weighted marginal posterior L values
  • dpost (np.ndarray) – array of equally weighted marginal posterior d values
  • (bool, optional) (resume) – MultiNest will resume the calculation if True
  • test_plot (bool or None) – for debugging purposes, allows the user to sample the prior and compare to input data
Returns:

None
fabry.finesse.argon_solver.full_solver(output_folder, prior_filename, data_filename, resume=True, test_plot=False)¶
MultiNest solver for point spread function calibration with the Argon filter. This is a
full solver. L and d will be solved as well!
Parameters:
  • output_folder (str) – path to folder containing input and output files for finesse solver
  • prior_filename (str) – path to file for the MultiNest prior (json format)
  • data_filename (str) – path to file for the input data
  • resume (bool or None) – MultiNest will resume the calculation if True
  • test_plot (bool or None) – for debugging purposes, allows the user to sample the prior and compare to input data

Helium Solver¶

This module contains a few different MultiNest calibration solvers for the Th lamp with the 468.6 nm 0.5 fwhm nm bandpass filter.

fabry.finesse.helium_solver.mu¶

float with the relative mass of Th

fabry.finesse.helium_solver.w0¶

float with the dominant Th I wavelength inside the bandpass filter

fabry.finesse.helium_solver.full_solver(output_folder, data_filename, resume=True, test_plot=False)¶

MultiNest solver for point spread function calibration with the He filter

Parameters:
  • output_folder (str) – path to folder containing input and output files
  • data_filename (str) – path to file for input data
  • resume (bool or None) – MultiNest will resume the calculation if True
  • test_plot (bool or None) – for debugging purposes, allows the u ser to sample the prior and compare to input data
fabry.finesse.helium_solver.solver(output_folder, prior_filename, data_filename, Lpost, dpost, resume=True, test_plot=False)¶

MultiNest solver for point spread function with He filter. Uses previous L and d wavelength results.

Parameters:
  • output_folder (str) – path to folder containing input and output files
  • prior_filename (str) – Unused
  • Lpost (np.ndarray) – array of posterior probabilties for the camera focal length, L
  • dpost (np.ndarray) – array of posterior probabilities for the etalon spacing, d
  • resume (bool or None) – MultiNest will resume the calculation if True
  • test_plot (bool or None) – for debugging purposes, allows the u ser to sample the prior and compare to input data

Check Argon Solver¶

fabry.finesse.check_argon_solver.mu¶

Tuple with the relative masses for Th and Ar

fabry.finesse.check_argon_solver.w0¶

Tuple with Th I and Ar II wavelengths used for calibration

fabry.finesse.check_argon_solver.check_solver(finesse_folder, Lpost, dpost)¶

Verfies the output of the point spread function solver. Makes many plots.

Parameters:
  • finesse_folder (str) – path to folder containing output files from the finesse solver
  • Lpost (np.ndarray) – array of equally weighted marginal posterior L values
  • dpost (np.ndarray) – array of equally weighted marginal posterior d values
fabry.finesse.check_argon_solver.check_full_solver(finesse_folder)¶

Verfies the output of the full point spread function solver. Makes many plots.

Parameters:finesse_folder (str) – path to folder containing output files from the finesse solver
